product_name: Outdoor Products Power Pack Glide Daypack 2.0
long_description: Frequent fliers and overloaded travelers will enjoy the Outdoor Products Power Pack Glide 2.0 daypack, which offers loads of organization options and a checkpoint-friendly laptop storage sleeve. Laptop sleeve fits15 in. laptop computers and rests within its own zip compartment; sleeve connects to pack via dual quick-release buckles and slides out for easy screening. Checkpoint-friendly design meets TSA screening requirements. Large main pocket holds files, books, folders and other large items. Hidden compartment behind pack straps holds passport and plane tickets in a retractable sleeve; hidden lower compartment at lower back hides a wallet. Roomy organizer pocket has numerous slot, zip, neoprene and mesh pockets for digital gear; securely stash your tablet in its own foam-padded slot pocket and keys on a fob. Includes fleece-lined sunglasses pocket, and zip stash and stretch mesh side pockets. Top carry strap has a soft-grip textured handle. Breathable padded back panel keeps you cool; padded shoulder straps sit comfortably on shoulders and comfortably distribute the pack's weight. Power Pack Glide 2.0 is built with rugged polyester twill fabric for long-lasting durability.
short_description: Frequent fliers and overloaded travelers will enjoy the Outdoor Products Power Pack Glide 2.0 daypack, which offers loads of organization options and a checkpoint-friendly laptop storage sleeve.
